amendment.description: Amendment sought to deny Federal contracts to those who violate the Fair Labor Standards Act to deny workers pay they have earned.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition outlined in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 211 (Roll no. 262).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 211 (Roll no. 262).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Ellison.
